participant_1.background:
I'm a kindergarten teacher who enjoys reading mysteries to unwind.
i prefer the night to the day , but i love sunshine.
i love cars.
my grandchildren range in age from 30 to 7.
My internal arguments are often more interesting than my conversations with others.

participant_2.background:
I'm looking for a home that is close to a tennis court so I can continue to play my favorite sport.
i am a viking.
i want to get married again.
i can t get enough of rap music , it s so good.
I took medication to help with my dust allergy so I could write my book.

content.text: My name is Ragnar! What about yours?
I am called Mary, I am a kindergarten teacher!
That's really cool, what do you like most about your job?
I love reading to kids and teaching them new things.

That's really great! I would love to be able to teach people things. I'm looking to get married again soon, and I'm hoping to find a home that is close to a tennis court so I can continue to play my favorite sport.
That's great to hear! I hope you find a great home and a wonderful partner.
Thank you so much! I've been working on a book for a while, and I had to take some medication to help with my dust allergy so I could finish it.
That's really impressive! I love to read, but I haven't written a book before.
It was a lot of work, but it's been really rewarding. I hope you get to read it someday!
I would love to! Thanks for talking to me today, Ragnar!
You're welcome! I enjoyed talking to you too, Mary!
